technologies.title: HTML
technologies.description: I use HTML to create well-structured, semantic components, focusing on accessibility and clarity. This approach improves SEO, user experience, and ensures optimized performance across devices.

technologies.title: Css
technologies.description: I use CSS to create clean, responsive designs, focusing on maintainability and scalability. With techniques like Flexbox, Grid, and media queries, I ensure a smooth user experience across devices.

technologies.title: JavaScript
technologies.description: I use JavaScript to build dynamic, interactive web applications, focusing on clean, maintainable code. I leverage modern ES6+ features to create efficient, scalable solutions that enhance user experience and performance across devices.

technologies.title: React
technologies.description: I build responsive and modular UI components with React, utilizing hooks, context API, and state management techniques to create dynamic, maintainable applications. My focus is on creating reusable components that ensure a seamless user experience across different devices.

technologies.title: Git/GitHub
technologies.description: I use Git for version control and collaborate on projects via GitHub, following best practices like branching, pull requests, and meaningful commit messages to maintain a clean and organized codebase.
